languages.text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text: Когда Ульфар должен упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, вместо этого он на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} становится неактивным. Он получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, не может быть выбран в качестве цели и может служить полным {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} для союзников. Про прошествии 2 раундов он возвращается в бой с 50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. ! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

traits.locale_text: When Ulfar should fall unconscious, instead he stays inactive for 2 rounds, becoming untargetable and immune to damage, also counting as full cover for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum wounds. ! Can only be used once per combat.

When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text: Si Ulfar quedaría {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, en vez de eso permanece inactivo durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, volviéndose inmune al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y no siendo válido como objetivo. Además, cuenta como {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura total{/g} para sus aliados. Al cabo de 2 asaltos, vuelve al combate con el 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas. ! Solo funciona una vez por combate.
languages.original_text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Si Ulfar quedaría {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, en vez de eso permanece inactivo durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, volviéndose inmune al daño y no siendo válido como objetivo. Además, cuenta como {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura total{/g} para sus aliados. Al cabo de 2 asaltos, vuelve al combate con el 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas. ! Solo funciona una vez por combate.

languages.text: 当乌尔法陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态下时，会陷入休眠状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。休眠期间，乌尔法无法被指定为目标，并免疫所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此外，还可以被他的盟友当做{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}使用。 两轮之后，他会恢复最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%，再次返回战斗。 ！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
languages.original_text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: 当乌尔法陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态下时，会陷入休眠状态，持续两{/g}轮{g|Encyclopedia:Round}。休眠期间，乌尔法无法被指定为目标，并免疫所有伤害。此外，还可以被他的盟友当做{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}使用。 两轮之后，他会恢复最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%，再次返回战斗。 ！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text: Plutôt que de {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdre connaissance{/g}, Ulfar reste inactif pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Il est alors à l'abri des attaques et des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, et offre une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g} à ses alliés. Une fois ces 2 rounds écoulés, il revient au combat avec 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum. ! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Plutôt que de {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdre connaissance{/g}, Ulfar reste inactif pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Il est alors à l'abri des attaques et des dégâts, et offre une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g} à ses alliés. Une fois ces 2 rounds écoulés, il revient au combat avec 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum. ! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text: Würde Ulfar {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} werden, bleibt er stattdessen 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang inaktiv. In dieser Zeit kann nicht auf ihn gezielt werden und er ist immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, was für seine Verbündeten auch als {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}volle Deckung{/g} zählt. Nach 2 Runden kehrt er mit 50 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in den Kampf zurück.! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Falls Ulfar {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} werden sollte, bleibt er stattdessen 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang inaktiv. Während dessen kann nicht auf ihn gezielt werden und er wird immun gegen Schäden, was für seine Verbündeten auch als {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}volle Deckung{/g} zählt. Nach 2 Runden kehrt er mit 50 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in den Kampf zurück.! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Когда Ульфар должен упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, вместо этого он на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} становится неактивным. Он получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, не может быть выбран в качестве цели и может служить полным {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} для союзников. Про прошествии 2 раундов он возвращается в бой с 50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. ! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
languages.original_text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда Ульфар должен упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, вместо этого он на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} становится неактивным. Он получает иммунитет к урону, не может быть выбран в качестве цели и может служить {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}полным укрытием{/g} для союзников. Про прошествии 2 раундов он возвращается в бой с 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. ! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Когда Ульфар должен упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, вместо этого он на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} становится неактивным. Он получает иммунитет к урону, не может быть выбран в качестве цели и может служить {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}полным укрытием{/g} для союзников. Про прошествии 2 раундов он возвращается в бой с 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. ! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

languages.text: ウルファーが{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}の状態になるはずのところで、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間動かなくなる代わりに、ターゲットとならなくなり{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を無効化する。同時に、彼の味方にとっての{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}フルカバー{/g}とみなされる。 2ラウンド後、彼は最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の50%で戦闘に復帰する。 !1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text: ウルファーが{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}の状態になるはずのところで、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間動かなくなる代わりに、ターゲットとならなくなりダメージを無効化する。同時に、彼の味方にとっての{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}フルカバー{/g}とみなされる。 2ラウンド後、彼は最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の50%で戦闘に復帰する。 !1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。

languages.text: Ulfar, {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düşecekken onun yerine 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} hareketsiz kalır. Bu süreçte hedeflenemez ve {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazanır. Ayrıca dost birimleri için {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}tam siperde{/g} kabul edilir. 2 raundun ardından maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %50'si ile çatışmaya döner. ! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text: When Ulfar should fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, instead he stays inactive for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, becoming untargetable and immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, also counting as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for his allies. After 2 rounds, he returns to the fight with 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! Can only be used once per combat.
